content.rendered:
How To Apply

The California Dream Act Application allows eligible students to apply for institutional and state financial aid programs at the University of La Verne.  The application deadline each year is March 2nd.

Aid Programs Available

Students who qualify for aid under the California Dream Act may qualify for the following programs:

  • University of La Verne Merit Scholarships  (Traditional Undergraduate ONLY)
  • University of La Verne Need Based Grants (Traditional Undergraduate ONLY)
  • Cal Grant
  • Private Scholarship Programs

Have questions?  We’re here to help!  Please contact a La Verne Financial Aid counselor:  finaid@laverne.edu
